thread.title: 15 Pieces From OTHER’s Brand New Collection That You Can Cop Right Now
thread.title_full: 15 Pieces From OTHER’s Brand New Collection That You Can Cop Right Now

author: Aaron Howes
title: 15 Pieces From OTHER’s Brand New Collection That You Can Cop Right Now
text:
British design studio and lifestyle brand OTHER just dropped its brand new SS17 collection “OTHERSIDE” combining the brand’s signature look with classic hip-hop and rock ‘n’ roll-influenced designs.
The brand shot the collection’s lookbook in sunny Los Angeles — a reference to the ‘80s and ‘90s scenes that inspired this season. The label continues its heavy use of oversized fits, drapey silhouettes and distressing. Orange and yellow are key colors for SS17 alongside monochrome shades.
Here are our 15 favorite pieces from the collection that you can cop right now.
Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now Buy Now
